smg.text: Cold and dry. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 2 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Light rain later. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Cloudy. A few rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Light rain at first. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
